PitchFirstRhythmMaker¶

class baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(acciaccatura_specifiers=None, beam_specifier=None, division_masks=None, duration_specifier=None, logical_tie_masks=None, talea=None, tie_specifier=None, time_treatments=None, tuplet_specifier=None)¶

Collection rhythm-maker.

>>> from abjad import rhythmmakertools as rhythmos

Sixteenths and eighths:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10, 8]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89) 

>>> collections = [[18, 16, 15, 20, 19]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89) 

>>> collections = [[9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89) 

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10, 8], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Special methods

__call__(collections, collection_index=None, rest_affix_specifier=None, state=None, total_collections=None)¶

Calls rhythm-maker on collections.

Without state manifest:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89) 

>>> abjad.f(rhythm_maker._make_state())
abjad.OrderedDict(
    [
        ('_next_attack', 9),
        ('_next_segment', 3),
        ]
    )

With state manifest:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> state = {'_next_attack': 2}
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(
...     collections,
...     state=state,
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89) 

>>> abjad.f(rhythm_maker._make_state())
abjad.OrderedDict(
    [
        ('_next_attack', 11),
        ('_next_segment', 3),
        ]
    )

Returns selections together with state manifest.

(AbjadValueObject).__copy__(*arguments)¶

Copies Abjad value object.

Returns new Abjad value object.

(AbjadValueObject).__eq__(argument)¶

Is true when all initialization values of Abjad value object equal the initialization values of argument.

Returns true or false.

(AbjadObject).__format__(format_specification='')¶

Formats Abjad object.

Set format_specification to ‘’ or ‘storage’. Interprets ‘’ equal to ‘storage’.

Returns string.

(AbjadValueObject).__hash__()¶

Hashes Abjad value object.

Returns integer.

(RhythmMaker).__illustrate__(divisions=((3, 8), (4, 8), (3, 16), (4, 16)))¶

Illustrates rhythm-maker.

Returns LilyPond file.

(AbjadObject).__repr__()¶

Gets interpreter representation of Abjad object.

Returns string.

Class & static methods

static show(selections, time_signatures=None)¶

Makes rhythm-maker-style LilyPond file for documentation examples.

Returns LilyPond file.

Read-only properties

acciaccatura_specifiers¶

Gets acciaccatura specifiers.

Graced quarters:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier()
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=4,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Graced rests:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier(
...             lmr_specifier=baca.LMRSpecifier()
...             ),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=4,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [None],
...     [0, None],
...     [2, 10, None],
...     [18, 16, 15, None],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, None],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15, None],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10, None],
...     ]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker()
>>> rhythm_maker.acciaccatura_specifiers is None
True

Set to acciaccatura specifiers or none.

Returns acciaccatura specifiers or none.

beam_specifier¶

Gets beam specifier.

Beams each division by default:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     time_treatments=[1],
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> staff = lilypond_file[abjad.Staff]
>>> abjad.override(staff).tuplet_bracket.staff_padding = 1.5
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Beams divisions together:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     beam_specifier=rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         ),
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     time_treatments=[1],
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> staff = lilypond_file[abjad.Staff]
>>> abjad.override(staff).beam.positions = (-5.5, -5.5)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Beams nothing:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     beam_specifier=rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_each_division=False,
...         ),
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     time_treatments=[1],
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Does not beam rests:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     time_treatments=[1],
...     )

>>> collections = [[None, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, None], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> staff = lilypond_file[abjad.Staff]
>>> abjad.override(staff).tuplet_bracket.staff_padding = 1.5
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Does beam rests:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     beam_specifier=rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_rests=True,
...     ),
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     time_treatments=[1],
...     )

>>> collections = [[None, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, None], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> staff = lilypond_file[abjad.Staff]
>>> abjad.override(staff).tuplet_bracket.staff_padding = 1.5
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Beams rests with stemlets:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     beam_specifier=rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_rests=True,
...         stemlet_length=0.75,
...     ),
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     time_treatments=[1],
...     )

>>> collections = [[None, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, None], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> staff = lilypond_file[abjad.Staff]
>>> abjad.override(staff).tuplet_bracket.staff_padding = 1.5
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker()
>>> rhythm_maker.beam_specifier is None
True

Set to beam specifier or none.

Returns beam specifier or none.

division_masks¶

Gets division masks.

No division masks:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Silences every other division:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     division_masks=[
...         abjad.silence([1], 2),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Sustains every other division:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     division_masks=[
...         abjad.sustain([1], 2),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker()
>>> rhythm_maker.division_masks is None
True

Set to division masks or none.

Returns tuple of division masks or none.

duration_specifier¶

Gets duration specifier.

Spells nonassignable durations with monontonically decreasing durations by default:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[4, 4, 5],
...         denominator=32,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Spells nonassignable durations with monontonically increasing durations:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     duration_specifier=rhythmos.DurationSpecifier(
...         decrease_monotonic=False,
...         ),
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[4, 4, 5],
...         denominator=32,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker()
>>> rhythm_maker.duration_specifier is None
True

Set to duration specifier or none.

Returns duration specifier or none.

logical_tie_masks¶

Gets logical tie masks.

Silences every third logical tie:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     logical_tie_masks=[
...         abjad.silence([2], 3),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Silences first and last logical ties:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     logical_tie_masks=[
...         abjad.silence([0]),
...         abjad.silence([-1]),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker()
>>> rhythm_maker.logical_tie_masks is None
True

Set to patterns or none.

Returns tuple patterns or none.

(RhythmMaker).previous_state¶

Gets previous state dictionary.

Return type:OrderedDict
(RhythmMaker).state¶

Gets state dictionary.

Return type:OrderedDict
talea¶

Gets talea.

With rests:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     beam_specifier=rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_rests=True,
...         stemlet_length=1.5,
...         ),
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[3, -1, 2, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

With very large nonassignable counts:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[29],
...         denominator=64,
...         ),
...     tie_specifier=rhythmos.TieSpecifier(
...         repeat_ties=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to even sixteenths:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker()
>>> rhythm_maker.talea
Talea(counts=[1], denominator=16)

Set to talea or none.

Returns talea.

tie_specifier¶

Gets tie specifier.

Ties across divisions with matching pitches:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     tie_specifier=rhythmos.TieSpecifier(
...         tie_across_divisions=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [10, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Ties consecutive notes with matching pitches:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     tie_specifier=rhythmos.TieSpecifier(
...         tie_consecutive_notes=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [10, 16, 16, 19, 19], [19]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker()
>>> rhythm_maker.tie_specifier is None
True

Set to tie specifier or none.

Returns tie specifier or none.

time_treatments¶

Gets time treatments.

One extra count per division:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     time_treatments=[1],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

One missing count per division:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     time_treatments=[-1],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Accelerandi:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     time_treatments=['accel'],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)

Ritardandi:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     time_treatments=['rit'],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)

Accelerandi followed by ritardandi:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     time_treatments=['accel', 'rit'],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0, 2],
...     [10, 18, 16, 15, 20],
...     [19, 9, 0, 2, 10, 18],
...     ]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)

Mixed accelerandi, ritardandi and prolation:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     time_treatments=['accel', -2, 'rit'],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2],
...     [10, 18, 16, 15, 20],
...     [19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)

Specified by tuplet multiplier:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     time_treatments=[abjad.Ratio((3, 2))],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> staff = lilypond_file[abjad.Staff]
>>> abjad.override(staff).beam.positions = (-6, -6)
>>> abjad.override(staff).stem.direction = Down
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Segment durations equal to a quarter:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     time_treatments=[abjad.Duration(1, 4)],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     tuplet_specifier=rhythmos.TupletSpecifier(
...         denominator=abjad.Duration(1, 16),
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> staff = lilypond_file[abjad.Staff]
>>> abjad.override(staff).beam.positions = (-6, -6)
>>> abjad.override(staff).stem.direction = Down
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Segment durations alternating between a quarter and a dotted quarter:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     time_treatments=[abjad.Duration(1, 4), abjad.Duration(3, 8)],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1, 1, 2],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     tuplet_specifier=rhythmos.TupletSpecifier(
...         denominator=abjad.Duration(1, 16),
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2],
...     [10, 18, 16, 15, 20],
...     [19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> staff = lilypond_file[abjad.Staff]
>>> abjad.override(staff).beam.positions = (-6, -6)
>>> abjad.override(staff).stem.direction = Down
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker()
>>> rhythm_maker.time_treatments is None
True

Set to time treatments or none.

Time treatments defined equal to integers; positive multipliers; positive durations; and the strings 'accel' and 'rit'.

Returns tuple of time treatments or none.

tuplet_specifier¶

Gets tuplet specifier.

Does not simplify redudant tuplets by default:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[3],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     time_treatments=[-2],
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2], [10, 18, 16], [15, 20], [19, 9, None]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> staff = lilypond_file[abjad.Staff]
>>> abjad.override(staff).tuplet_bracket.staff_padding = 1.5
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Trivializes tuplets:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[3],
...         denominator=16,
...         ),
...     time_treatments=[-2],
...     tuplet_specifier=rhythmos.TupletSpecifier(
...         trivialize=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2], [10, 18, 16], [15, 20], [19, 9, None]]
>>> selections, state = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> staff = lilypond_file[abjad.Staff]
>>> abjad.override(staff).tuplet_bracket.staff_padding = 1.5
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker()
>>> rhythm_maker.tuplet_specifier is None
True

Set to tuplet specifier or none.

Returns tuplet specifier or none.
